mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, board_no, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_count, board_like, board_orifile, board_refile, appid, user_id, board_notice from (select * from tb_board_gen order by board_count desc)) where rnum >= #{ startRow } and rnum <= #{endRow}
select * from tb_board_gen where board_no = #{ board_no }
select * from tb_board_gen where board_title like '%' || #{ search } || '%' order by board_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_board_gen(BOARD_NO, board_title, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_LIKE, BOARD_ORIFILE, BOARD_REFILE, APPID, USER_ID, BOARD_NOTICE) values((select max(board_no) + 1 from tb_board_gen), #{board_title}, #{board_content}, sysdate, 0, 0, #{board_orifile}, #{board_refile}, #{appid}, #{user_id}, null)
mapper.delete: delete from tb_board_gen where board_no = #{ board_no }
mapper.insert: insert into TB_COMMENT(COM_NO, COM_CONTENTS, COM_DATE, BOARD_NO, USER_ID, com_lev) values(seq_comment.nextval,#{com_contents}, sysdate, #{board_no}, #{user_id}, 0)
